statements.insert: if(0=(select COUNT(*) c from Pam_BookMeal)) begin Insert Into Pam_BookMeal ( CheckInTime,Status,OperatedBy,OperatedOn,DataSource,StationId, OldManId,MealType,SetMealId,BookDate,FetchFlag) values (GETDATE(),1,'00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000',GETDATE(),'00003','6203dd5c-c480-436f-8ca3-1672055ea5c7', 'A9999999-0000-0000-0000-000000000000','00001','A9999999-0000-0000-0000-000000000000',GETDATE(),0) end Insert Into Pam_BookMeal ( CheckInTime,Status,OperatedBy,OperatedOn,DataSource,StationId, OldManId,MealType,SetMealId,BookDate,FetchFlag) select top 1 GETDATE(),1,#OperatedBy#,#OperatedOn#,#DataSource#,#StationId#, #OldManId#,#MealType#,#SetMealId#,#BookDate#,#FetchFlag# from Pam_BookMeal where 0=(select COUNT(*) c from Pam_BookMeal where StationId=#StationId# and OldManId=#OldManId# and MealType=#MealType# and datediff(D, BookDate,#BookDate#)=0 and Status=1)
statements.select:
select x.OldManId,OldManName,$PivotColumnsForSelect$ from Oca_OldManBaseInfo x left join ( select OldManId,$PivotColumns$ from( select oldManId,BookDate,dbo.JoinStr(MealInfo) as MealInfo from (select bm.oldManId,SUBSTRING(CONVERT(varchar(100), bm.BookDate, 112),1,11) BookDate ,dbo.JoinStr(CAST(bm.Id as CHAR(20)) +'|'+cast(bm.MealType as char(5))+'|'+ dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('13003',bm.MealType) +'|' + cast(bm.OldManId as char(36))+'|' + cast(sm.SetMealId as char(36))+'|'+sm.SetMealName +'|'+cast(bm.FetchFlag as CHAR(2))+'|'+case bm.FetchFlag when 0 then '未取' else '已取' end +'|'+isnull(bm.Remark,'') ) as MealInfo from Pam_BookMeal bm left join Pam_SetMeal sm on bm.SetMealId=sm.SetMealId where bm.Status=1 group By bm.oldManId, bm.BookDate ) b group By oldManId, BookDate ) a pivot(max(MealInfo) for BookDate in($PivotColumns$))b ) y on x.OldManId =y.OldManId
inner join (select ro.OldManId,ro.RoomId,r.FloorNo from Pam_RoomOldMan ro inner join Pam_Room r on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId where ro.EndDate>GETDATE() and r.Status=1 and r.StationId=#StationId# ) z on x.OldManId=z.OldManId
where x.StationId=#StationId# and x.Status =3
z.RoomId=#RoomId# z.FloorNo=#FloorNo#
$OldManName$ order by OldManName asc
statements.update: delete Pam_BookMeal where Status=1 and BookDate>=#CopyTo_Start# and BookDate<=#CopyTo_End# and OldManId in ($OldManIds$) insert into Pam_BookMeal (CheckInTime,OperatedBy,OperatedOn ,DataSource,StationId,OldManId,MealType,SetMealId,BookDate,FetchFlag,Remark ) select GETDATE() CheckInTime,'$OperatedBy$' OperatedBy,GETDATE() OperatedOn ,DataSource,StationId,OldManId,MealType,SetMealId ,dateadd(day,#Days#,BookDate) BookDate,FetchFlag,Remark from Pam_BookMeal where Status=1 and BookDate>=#CopyFrom_Start# and BookDate<=#CopyFrom_End# and OldManId in ($OldManIds$)
